name: workspace
description: ## Utilizes the following: * Node.js, express, mongodb, JavaScript, Jquery, HTML5,CSS3 * Create a front end for building a personal fantasy football team * Utilize external API queries for actual player data * Provide API endpoints for external querying of DB * Provide authentication for users of app * Provide chat functionality between users * Display a 'news ticker' of external FF news * Make it fun and visually appealing
author: Daniel Jenner
